app_description.message: Video Downloader VeeVee – download videos from the Internet.

not_found_description.message: Try reloading the page and playing the media file

not_allow_description.message: The :platform Web Store no longer allows extensions to download :name videos.

search_not_found_description.message: We didn't find anything for the request ":search"

loading_description.message: Give me a second, I'm trying to find the files

player_standalone_message.message: Please don't close the browser tab where you opened the video. If the tab with video is closed, the video streaming via Chromecast will be completed.

player_chromecast_unavailable.message: Chromecast device not found. Please note that some Smart TVs don't support Chromecast.

player_not_found_description.message: Please, don't close browser tab where video playing

qr_code_description.message: Turn on the camera on your phone to scan the QR code and download the video

download_disclaimer.message: Please note that you can only download videos for which you have copyright or with the permission of the copyright holder.

download_disclaimer_note.message: Click the ":button" button if you have read this text and agree with it.

block_download_description.message: Your video isn't downloading because the browser is asking for a location to save the video. Please go to your browser settings and disable the "Ask where to save each file before downloading" option. After that, start downloading the video again and the file will be saved in the Downloads folder.

notification_download_complete.message: File downloaded successfully. Click to go to the downloaded file.

notification_download_cancel.message: Download canceled. Please click the "Download" button if you would like to download the file again.

notification_download_error.message: The file didn't download. Please click the "Download" button if you want to download the file again.

notification_block_download.message: Sorry, the download didn't start. Please go to Settings and disable the option "Ask where to save each file before downloading".

notification_background_download.message: The file has started downloading. Please wait.

notification_clear_list.message: The list has been cleared. Please refresh the page to see the available files on the current page.

popup_notification_download_error.message: The file didn't download. Click the "Download" button if you want to download the file again.

copyright_footnote.message: If you believe that downloading content is infringing on your copyright, you can report it to us by filling out Copyright Report Form or click the icon on the footer.

copyright_report_document.message: Link to a document certifying that you have exclusive rights to the material posted on the site:

copyright_report_legal.message: By clicking the “:button” button, you agree to the processing of personal data.

copyright_note_1.message: When filling out the request, the site where you opened the extension window is fixed. Please check that copyrighted content is on the page with the extension open.

copyright_note_2.message: Only the copyright owner or his authorized representative may file a copyright infringement claim. If you believe that the content you are downloading infringes your copyright, please let us know by completing Copyright Report Form.

copyright_note_3.message: We regularly exclude sites that contain copyrighted content from the list of videos available for download.

form_empty_error.message: The “:name” field must not be empty

form_email_error.message: The “:name” field must be a valid email address

form_url_error.message: The “:name” field must be a valid link
